name: RealChoiceBenefitProgram
0:
”Alexa, ask RealChoice when is annual enrollment?”
”Alexa, tell RealChoice I need medical insurance.”
”Alexa, ask RealChoice when will I receive my card?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: real choice
des: Understanding your benefits can be difficult if you don’t use the correct terminology. The John Hancock RealChoice skill helps provide John Hancock employees with answers to open enrollment and benefits questions. This skill helps John Hancock employees stay informed about the latest benefit information and programs available.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
